channel.title: Startup on Dr. Mowinckel's
channel.description: Recent content in Startup on Dr. Mowinckel's

item.title: Customise your R startup message
item.description: Customize your R startup experience by modifying the R startup message, adding useful system information, and fun elements like a praise or colour bar. Learn how to edit the .Rprofile file, clear the console, print system details, and add a personalised message using the {praise} and {cli} packages for an enjoyable R session.
